ygData.subject: Re: Identify how do I use it?
ygData.msgSnippet: You are missing something.  You just need to actually hold the item in your hand (cursor).  You have to actually take it out of your inventory and then click
ygData.messageBody:
You are missing something. You just need to actually hold the item in your
hand (cursor). You have to actually take it out of your inventory and then
click done at the bottom so you go back to the spells you have memorized,
then click the spell and it will tell you about what you are holding. It
doesn't really do a whole heck of a lot though. Its one of those spells I
hope they do something for to make it worthwhile. I find its just a
novelty pretty much...at least I haven't found any real use for it yet.



At 03:46 AM 6/11/99 +0100, you wrote:
>From: TaffyPaulB <TaffyPaulB@...>
>
>Hail fellow wizards of Norrath,
>
>Could some wise wizard please pass along some of their unbound knowledge &
>explain just how you use the Identify spell? I have it memorized, but I keep
>getting told I'm not holding the item. Does the spell only work on weapons
>that
>fit in the melee slots, or am I missing something?
>
>Thank ye for thine help
>Padab 20th season on the Innoruuk server
